image_1.entity_name: Figure 1: A sample from WIKIHOP where multi-step reasoning and information combination from different documents is necessary to infer the correct answer
image_1.description: WIKIHOP is a multi-document question answering dataset created by Welbl et al., 2018, which requires multi-step reasoning and information combination from different documents.

image_2.description: Entity graph is the structure where nodes represent mentions of entities and are connected by different types of relations.
